DESCRIPTION: Your next #yBlock gaining card gains additional #yBlock.
Exposed creatures take more damage from Attacks this turn.
Staggered creatures deal less damage with Attacks this turn.
Add an extra effect onto a card this combat.
Choose #b1 of #b3 random cards to add into your hand.
Abilities can be upgraded any number of times via accumulated damage dealt, but cannot be upgraded normally.
A planted card is set aside. Each turn, place a #yGrowth #yToken on it, increasing its damage and #yBlock. You may #yRight #yClick a planted card to add it into your hand.
Growth increases a card's damage and #yBlock amounts.
